battleLog.attackCommentary: The whirlwind of the Dragon's fury explodes as Bruce Lee lands a punishing combo on Victor Moreau! The crowd erupts, 12 points already in their lead. This fight is off.
battleLog.defenseCommentary: Moreau circles defensively as Bruce Lee's lightning reflexes keep him at bay. The pressure is on for a decisive opening in this Round 1 standoff.

battleLog.attackCommentary: Moreau presses his relentless combo forward, a flurry of calculated strikes against the lightning-fast Bruce Lee! Will this pressure break through and end round two.
battleLog.defenseCommentary: Moreau tests Bruce's legendary speed with a flurry of kicks, but the Dragon skillfully sidesteps each one, demonstrating perfect defensive flow in round two. 20 seconds left and pressure is.
battleLog.randomEvent: Victor Moreau narrowly dodges Bruce Lee's attack!

battleLog.attackCommentary: Moreau eats a punishing flurry from Bruce Lee in round three! A critical 16 damage leaves Victor reeling as The Little Dragon pushes their advantage.
battleLog.defenseCommentary: Moreau's on red block as Bruce Lee presses their combo relentlessly! This calculated defensive stand could reset the entire momentum of round 3.
